Package controller

Class SeatController

java.lang.Object
controller.SeatController
public class SeatController extends Object
Controller for Seat objects, each corresponds to a unique movie
Since:
2022-11-13
Version:
1.0

      public boolean seatExists(String trySeatCode)
      // checks if the seatCode corresponds to an actual seat and not booked yet
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The indicator whether the seat is an actual seat and unoccupied
